required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of CS1001 in Combination With Donafenib in Subjects With Advanced Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I/II, Multicenter,Open-label,Dose-Escalation and Expansion Study of CS1001 in Combination With Donafenib in Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors

brief_summary.textblock: This study will evaluate the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetic profile and treatment effect of CS1001 in combination with Donafenib in patients with advanced solid tumors.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with adverse events
primary_outcome.time_frame: From the day of first dose to 21 days after last dose

primary_outcome.measure: To determine the dose limiting toxicity (DLT)
primary_outcome.time_frame: In the dose escalation part, from the day of first dose to 21 days after last dose

primary_outcome.measure: To determine the maximum tolerated dose(MTD)
primary_outcome.time_frame: In the dose escalation part, from the day of first dose to 21 days after last dose

primary_outcome.measure: To determine the recommended dose of phase II
primary_outcome.time_frame: In the dose escalation part, from the day of first dose to 21 days after last dose

primary_outcome.measure: Objective response rate as determined by the Invertigator using RECIST V1.1
primary_outcome.time_frame: In the dose escalation part, from the day of first dose to 21 days after last dose

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the day of first dose to 21 days after last dose
From the day of first dose to 21 days after last dose
From the day of first dose to 21 days after last dose
From the day of first dose to 21 days after last dose
From the day of first dose to 21 days after last dose

arm_group.description: CS1001(1200mg Q3W)+Donafenib(RP2D),hepatocellular carcinoma(HCC) patients will be assign
CS1001(1200mg Q3W)+Donafenib(RP2D),Head and neck squamous cell carcinoma(HNSCC) patients will be assign
CS1001(1200mg Q3W)+Donafenib(RP2D),Endometrial carcinoma patients will be assign

intervention.description: In the dose escalation part, the dose levels of Donafenib will be escalated folowing a modified 3+3 dose escalation scheme. Dose escalation 1:100 mg once a day;Dose escalation 2:100 mg twice a day;Dose escalation 3:200 mg twice a day.

In the dose expansion part, patients will be assigned to different groups based on their tumor types and treated at the recommended dose for phase 2(RP2D).The RP2D will be determined by the dose escalation study.
CS1001 will be administrated by intravenous (i.v.) infusion once every 28 days
